function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding about the effects of buildings attributes on occupant health","Impact":"Failure to educate staff can lead to unhealthy building design and management","Mitigation":"Educate design and facility management staff about healthy buildings","Technologies":"Education and training programs","People":"Design and facility management companies, universities","Owner":"Design and facility management companies, universities"},{"Description":"Lack of effective collaboration between project stakeholders","Impact":"Ineffective collaboration can lead to challenges in implementing healthy building solutions","Mitigation":"Promote effective collaboration and communication among stakeholders","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms and communication tools","People":"Project stakeholders","Owner":"Project stakeholders"},{"Description":"Lack of interest from employers and building owners","Impact":"Lack of interest can lead to reluctance to invest in healthy building solutions","Mitigation":"Raise awareness about the benefits of healthy buildings among employers and building owners","Technologies":"Educational materials, case studies, and economic analyses","People":"Employers, building owners","Owner":"Educational institutions, industry associations"}]}
